movies.title: Crunchyroll Anime Nights Sneak Peek: December Edition
movies.description: One-night Crunchyroll Anime Nights event offering a sneak peek at upcoming anime content, playing as a special nationwide theatrical engagement.

movies.title: Avatar: Fire and Ash
movies.description: The third film in James Cameron's Avatar franchise continues the story on Pandora as Jake Sully and Neytiri face new threats amid escalating conflict between the Na'vi and human invaders.

movies.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants
movies.description: The latest SpongeBob SquarePants theatrical adventure sends SpongeBob and his Bikini Bottom friends on a fantastical quest to find the missing SpongeBob and restore order under the sea.

movies.title: The Housemaid
movies.description: A psychological thriller about a young woman who takes a housekeeping job with a wealthy family, only to discover dark secrets and sinister motives lurking behind the facade of their luxurious life.

movies.title: Resurrection
movies.description: An expansive science fiction drama following intertwined characters confronting the consequences of a world-changing technological breakthrough that promises to upend life and death.

movies.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants (International label)
movies.description: Wider global rollout of the new SpongeBob theatrical feature, continuing the underwater hero's big-screen adventures for families and fans.

movies.title: The Voice of Hind Rajab
movies.description: A dramatic feature centered on a young girl named Hind Rajab and the human cost of conflict, told through an intimate, character-driven narrative.

movies.title: Is This Thing On?
movies.description: A character-driven dramedy about a stand-up comic whose personal and professional lives collide as he struggles to find his voice on and off the stage.

movies.title: Marty Supreme
movies.description: A sports drama from A24 following a driven young athlete nicknamed "Marty Supreme" as he navigates fame, family, and the pressures of competition on his rise to stardom.

movies.title: David
movies.description: A faith-driven animated musical retelling the biblical story of David, blending adventure and inspirational themes for family audiences.

movies.title: Mission Santa: Yoyo to the Rescue
movies.description: A family-friendly Christmas adventure in which Yoyo and friends embark on a mission to help Santa save the holiday season.
